title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a gecko in a dream, seeing a gecko entering the house in a dream, seeing a transparent gecko in a dream, and seeing a white gecko in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a gecko in a dream, interpreters believe that the vision is not good and appears bad, but it also appears good in some cases, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a gecko for singles, married people, pregnant women, and men according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Seeing a gecko in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, what is the interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream portends bad luck, especially if the dreamer sees it in his room, as this indicates that he will be exposed to fraud or theft in the coming period of his life and it may also indicate the presence of a deceiver. Someone in his life is planning to harm him, then he should watch himself and be careful. If the viewer sees a gecko walking on his body, this shows his sense of loss and confusion in his thoughts and shows that he cannot make the right decision about a certain thing, and this makes him feel uncomfortable and makes him unhappy with anything In his body. Life, perhaps he just needs to relax and calm down for a long time until he calms down and can think straight. Also, seeing him in the toilet is considered an evil omen, because it indicates the presence of a malicious person in the life of the visionary who does not have the skill to deal with him and who interferes in his personal affairs with the aim of harming him. And harming his reputation. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of senior dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream? Ibn Sirin believes that the vision is considered a warning. If the dreamer performs magic and works and harms people, then the dream is considered a warning to him to repent to God Almighty, ask for mercy and forgiveness, and stop what he is doing. Which he did not regret later. The dream indicates murder, adultery, and doing what angers God Almighty, so whoever dreams of it should review himself and stop all his mistakes. What is the interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? It is an indication of the spread of corruption and rebellion in the society in which the dreamer lives. , as it indicates the presence of some people in his life who speak ill of him in his absence. It may indicate that the gecko will suffer from some diseases in the future and he must take care of his health and follow the doctor’s instructions until his health improves and he returns to his healthy body and full health as it was before. Seeing a gecko in Dream by Imam Al-SadiqThe interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq indicates the presence of a devious and hypocritical person in the life of the dreamer who speaks about him in front of him with kind and encouraging words and in his absence distorts his image in front of people with false words. An indication of the presence of a person in the dreamer’s life who feels jealous of the blessings that he has, He wishes it would be taken away from him. The dream indicates a major quarrel that will occur between the dreamer and one of his family members, and the dream serves as a warning to control his anger at this person and try to reason with him calmly so as not to lose him. Seeing a gecko in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream for a single woman indicates that there are enemies in her life who are planning to harm her and want to see her in pain, so she must be careful in all her next steps and not trust anyone easily.

title: The 11 most famous interpretations of seeing a dragon in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a person in a dream that he has become a dragon? Evidence of his long life or his obtaining influence and an important position. The interpretation of seeing a green dragon in a dream? It expresses kindness and optimism. What is the interpretation of seeing a winged dragon? It indicates transformation and changing life for the better. Interpretation of the vision A pregnant woman in a dream gives birth to a dragon? Evidence that she will give birth to a boy. What is the interpretation of seeing a dragon spewing fire? Undesirable in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dragon by Ibn Sirin. If one sees in a dream that he has become a dragon, this is evidence of his long life or the acquisition of influence and important status. If one sees In a dream that he hunted dragon meat, he will get a lot of money. Then seeing a green dragon in a dream indicates kindness and optimism. A black dragon in a dream is a sign of unpleasant news, evil and praise in the dream. Then, seeing a dragon is often a symbol of anger and revolution. A dream about a winged dragon indicates transformation and changing the dreamer’s life for the better. Then, seeing a dragon transform into a woman is evidence of a combination of devilish women. Interpretation of seeing a green dragon for single people: A green dragon in a dream for a girl, if he attacks her, shows ambition and gets what she wants. Then, if the girl sees a dragon It flies and fire comes out of its mouth, this is evidence of its desire to be liberated and get rid of the morals and customs that limit it. Seeing a pregnant dragon For a pregnant woman to dream that she is giving birth to a dragon, this means that she will give birth to a male who speaks fluently with others. Then if he sees himself eating from the dragon, this is a sign of Longevity. Interpretation of a dream about a dragon by Nabulsi. A dragon in a dream indicates the enemy. Seeing a multi-headed dragon is evidence that the dreamer is cunning. Then, seeing a dragon expelling fire, this is not worthy of praise in the dream. If someone sees that he is riding a dragon, this indicates victories Which the dreamer will fight. Seeing a Commodore’s dragon indicates that there is a person in the dreamer’s life that he fears. Then seeing a dragon in a dream can symbolize an unjust ruler. After that, seeing a dragon can also indicate, in some visions, a disaster. If one sees In a dream that a dragon drags him into the water, this is a sign of the torment that Almighty God will send. Interpretation of a dream about a dragon for a manIf a man sees a green dragon in a dream, this indicates his success. Then seeing a green dragon indicates that this person has ambitions and desires that he wants to achieve. Killing the dragon In a man’s dream it means that he will be freed from fear and danger. Next, if a man sees in a dream that there are many dragon heads, this indicates that he is a very sinful person. If one sees that he has a dragon, he will defeat his enemies.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying her husband according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying her husband: Seeing a woman in a dream getting married to her husband raises astonishment and anxiety in her and makes her wonder about the different meanings and connotations associated with this dream, and whether it brings her good or bad. May God take care of her. Article.Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying her husband. See the many interpretations received by jurists regarding seeing a married woman marrying her husband in a dream: When a woman dreams that she is getting married again, this is a sign of the close relationship between her and love that has not been affected by the passage of time. For a married woman to dream of Marrying her husband also symbolizes her desire to renew her romantic relationship with her partner by taking care of him and creating beautiful surprises that bring them together. If a married woman dreams that she is getting married again to her husband, this means that both of them are doing everything in their power to make this relationship a success. If a crisis or problems arise between them, they solve them with mutual understanding and respect for each other. They are.Interpretation of the dream of a married woman marrying her husband by Ibn Sirin. The great Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - explained in a dream about the marriage of a married woman to her husband the following: If a woman sees in a dream that she is marrying her husband, this is a sign of many good things and benefits that She will come to her soon, God willing, and so will the state of love that is renewed between them as the days pass. As for the dreamer’s personality, seeing her getting married again during sleep proves that she is a rational person and can control her actions and control the course of things around her. In the event that there is a person in the woman’s life A married woman wants to divorce her husband and dreams that she is getting married again, then this is an indication of her ability to track him down and keep him out of their lives. Some interpretation scholars have explained that seeing a husband marrying a married woman leads to supporting the family and providing support and assistance in difficult circumstances. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of her marrying her husband. Here are the most important indications that interpretation scholars have explained regarding the dream of a pregnant woman marrying her husband: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream That she is marrying her husband, this is a sign that he is a good man who loves her deeply and supports her in all matters of her life and lives a stable and peaceful life with him. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that she is getting married again symbolizes an easy birth and a peaceful passage without feeling much fatigue. If the pregnant woman She works as an employee and dreams of marrying her husband, as this will lead her to a distinguished promotion at work that will bring her a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to her husband and wearing a white dress. Seeing a wedding for a woman married to her husband and wearing a white dress in a dream symbolizes that God - Glory be to Him - He will get her pregnant soon if he so desires. And if a married woman is pregnant and witnesses that she is marrying her husband and wearing a white wedding dress, this is a sign that she will give birth to a son, and God knows best. If there are disagreements between a woman and her husband and she dreams that she is marrying him again and wearing a white dress, this is evidence On her ability to solve problems

title: Complete interpretations of the interpretation of seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream, seeing pomegranate seeds in a dream, and seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream: Pomegranate is considered one of the distinctive fruits of autumn. It is one of the fruits that bring great benefits to humans, especially the richness of this fruit in vitamins and minerals. It is spoiled or edible, and pomegranate juice or pomegranates can be seen, then the connotations differ, and in this article we will list All the details of seeing a pomegranate in a dream. Seeing a pomegranate in a dream: Seeing a pomegranate expresses peace of mind, enjoyment of health and vitality, a feeling of strength, and the ability to achieve all goals easily. If one sees a pomegranate in a dream, this indicates the fruits that the dreamer reaps without suffering or fatigue, He achieves many goals with simple, smart and versatile means. Seeing pomegranates also indicates projects through which a person will achieve a lot of profits and circumstances will change for the better. If the fortuneteller is a merchant, then this vision indicates a large sum of money or the arrival of harvest time and reaping crops at the same time. Time. On the other hand, seeing a pomegranate is a sign of following the instructions of the mind, acting according to reason, and trying to stay away from desires and avoiding personal desires that push its owner to lie. Pomegranates also indicate things that seem normal and unsurprising on the outside, but inside they contain many things. Benefits and good things. The vision can be evidence of a treasure or a magic box. If the dreamer sees that he is eating a pomegranate, this indicates that he will make huge profits or make a lot of money and get a great benefit from doing something. This interpretation is based on the hypothesis that the taste Pomegranate Pomegranate is good. Psychologically, seeing a pomegranate fruit expresses the many temptations that are placed before a person to measure the extent of his patience, his ability to endure, and his convictions. Seeing a pomegranate in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a pomegranate fruit symbolizes happiness and joy, the death of sorrows and difficulties, and the fulfillment of The desired dream is to enjoy health and prudence, and to emerge from a great affliction. The pomegranate symbolizes a charming woman with her beauty and morals, and represents the desire that everyone wants to obtain. If one sees the fruit of a pomegranate in a dream, he will earn a lot of money and achieve hopes and ambitions that were not expected. Also, Seeing pomegranates indicates cities full of goodness and blessings, and the passage of a period of prosperity and well-being. A person may not feel these good things, but this does not prevent their availability and existence. Whoever is poor, the pomegranate in his dream expresses the spaciousness of life and his condition changes from hardship to comfort. As for the rich person, This vision indicates prosperity, prosperity, and abundance of food. For a sick person, this vision symbolizes recovery, recovery, rising from the bed of illness, and improvement of circumstances. If the viewer seeks to achieve something, this vision is an indication of achieving his goal and achieving his purpose, whether it is a mandate, authority, or an appropriate job. If the pomegranate has mold, this is a sign of great disappointment, malaise, and sadness at your inability to achieve the planned goals. Seeing the pomegranate fruit denotes

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing falling in a dream is one of the visions in which we find many different associations and everyone expresses their opinion about it, on the one hand psychologists and on the other hand jurists and this vision results in many fears and concerns due to its negative impact on many of us, and in this article we will explain all the signs in detail, taking into account whether the fortune teller is a man or a single woman or married and pregnant. I see myself falling in a dream The interpretation of the dream of falling symbolizes the constant fear that accompanies a person when he does something new in his life, especially if he decides to embark on an experience or enter into a new project or when he makes a decisive decision. The vision indicates the opportunities that are lost from the person's hand because he thinks about the consequences and bad results instead of thinking about the benefits that he can get if he takes this step. If the dreamer sees himself falling in his dream, this reflects a feeling of inferiority, weakness of character, panic from the idea of ​​​​failure and the view of life that it should always be a gain without loss. If the fortune teller is a high school or university student, this vision indicates the upcoming exam date, and the emotions that accompany this period, Exaggerating the subject in a way that negatively affects the viewer's mind. This vision also symbolizes the constant feeling of a threat, which forces a person to leave and withdraw from life and rely on his isolation, and this is a waste of his time, effort and opportunities that he could have exploited and reaped a lot from them. Seeing falling in a dream also expresses dispersion and loss, inability to continue on the path, hesitation in every decision and step taken by the dreamer, and looking at the future as a dark darkness in which there is nothing new except more failure and loss. . . The vision can be a warning to the fortuneteller to wake up from his slumber and start doing the things he recently planned and not fail in the tasks assigned to him because everyone has a plan or project, so you have to start immediately and without hesitation. . Interpretation of seeing falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing falling in a dream symbolizes the presence of a serious problem or crisis that the dreamer cannot find a suitable way out of, so he is forced instead to find a way to help him escape from this. Seeing falling also indicates many changes that occur in a person's life. If he lives up to it, he can survive and his success is written in what follows. But if he cannot, he drowns. Life is not for the strong, but for those who have been able to adapt to the changes that occur at a glance. Falling from high to low symbolizes the transition from one state to a worse state, as rising is always associated with high status and easy status, while falling symbolizes decline, failure and punishment, as God Almighty says: “We said, ‘Get down from all of these.’” And if he sees that he is falling from a place he knows, this indicates the disaster that he will soon witness, so

Ibn Sirin believes that seeing falling in a dream symbolizes the presence of a serious problem or crisis for which the dreamer cannot find a suitable way out, so he is instead forced to find a way to help him escape from this. Seeing falling also indicates many Of the changes that occur in a person's life. If he lives up to that, he can survive and his success is written into what comes next. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating fish with rice according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating fish with rice: Seeing fish in a dream is considered one of the desired events for the fortuneteller, because it symbolizes the abundance of goodness in life and great success. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish with rice by Ibn Sirinima Interpretation of a dream about eating fish with rice? Experts agree that eating fish with rice indicates More goodness and comfort in life because one will reach his many desires and achieve most of his ambitions. When a man sees that he meets his friends and eats fish and rice, it can be said that the relationship is close between them, and he is likely to think about a new job that brings them together, and there can be a feeling of happiness. Suitable for everyone, God willing. And if you see that you are eating this meal next to a friend of yours, the commentators will congratulate you on this friend because he is a loyal person who shares all aspects of life with you, whether sad or happy, and this good relationship will do. It will last forever, praise be to God. Sitting in the middle of the family to eat fish with rice is a good omen for sleeping in a calm atmosphere within the family, if there is disagreement between some, in addition to many benefits that reach everyone close. Interpretation of the dream of eating fish with rice by Ibn Sirin. World Focuses Ibn Sirin emphasized the fact that eating fish with rice is a good sign that indicates success and excellence in a particular matter for the monarch, according to his needs and life circumstances. It appears that when an unmarried man eats fish with rice in a dream, it indicates high commercial profits that allow him to achieve his goal. In marriage, where he can communicate with the girl he wants early, successfully in his work conditions. As for the husband or married woman, when he sees fish and rice being prepared for the family to eat, the atmosphere in the family is reassuring, and everyone participates in solving problems, and there is no Sadness and distress. As for the appearance and consumption of fish and rice by a pregnant woman, Ibn Sirin replaces the happiness that arrives at her door with childbirth, meaning that there is no harm to her or her child, but rather she is in good health and lives in peace. title: Long hair in a dream is good news for great scholars

preview.html: Long hair in a dream is good news. Long hair is considered one of the signs of beauty that has been on the throne of the best haircuts for many years, and many girls really love it, and seeing long hair in a dream is also a good omen and a good sign of what you want. Be a viewer for the advantages and the rest of the details in the next article ... Follow us Long hair in a dream is good news Many scholars have indicated that seeing long hair in a dream is one of the good news that will reach the dreamer in his life. The presence of long hair in the dreamer indicates closeness to God - the Almighty and the Most High - and a strong desire to increase the good deeds that he does. Some interpreters also reported that the presence of long hair in a dream indicates that the Creator will bless the dreamer with a long life by His command. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has long hair, this is a sign that the dreamer will get a lot of money and allowances in the near future. However, if the dreamer finds that the long hair in the dream has a bad and unclean appearance, this indicates worries and problems that disturb the dreamer's life, and God knows best. In addition, this vision indicates the dreamer's feeling of anxiety and fear of the future, which increases his fears and affects him negatively. Long hair in a dream is good news for Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing long hair in a dream is one of the good things that will happen in the dreamer's life and that God has written good for him. When the dreamer sees long and soft hair in In a dream, this means that the dreamer can achieve his ambitions and arrange them well. In addition, this dream symbolizes the joy that the dreamer will find in his life, and there are many good things in his life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has very long hair, this is a sign that the dreamer will achieve what he wants from dreams and will have a great position among people. If a person sees in his dream that he is cutting his long hair, this means that the dreamer will be miserable in his life because he will commit many unpleasant things in his life, and God knows best. Long hair in a dream is good news for Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi narrates that seeing long hair in a dream is good news and there are many benefits that a person receives in life. If the dreamer sees a girl’s beautiful and long hair in his dream, then fortunately the crises he is going through will have passed, and he will feel comfortable after periods of suffering. If the dreamer prepares long curly hair in a dream, making it softer, this is a sign that he is worried about the future, but he trusts in the Lord and that things will improve with him. Seeing long and straight hair in a dream indicates the ease and ease that will be the dreamer’s share in Life and that he will soon reach his goals by the command of God. The appearance of long, coarse hair in a dream is not a good omen, but rather indicates that the dreamer is going through a state of distraction and fatigue, and there are many difficulties during this period of his life. Long hair in a dream is good news for Ibn Shaheen. Imam Ibn Shaheen narrated that seeing long hair in a dream indicates that the

title: Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman in Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about makeup for another person for a married woman, and interpretation of a dream about makeup in front of a mirror for a married woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman? Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman in a dream. What are the clearest interpretations of this dream by interpreters? Does the scene differ depending on the type of makeup the dreamer is wearing on her face and what her external appearance was like in the dream, or not? In this article, the answers to these questions will be explained in detail. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman. Applying makeup in a dream for a married woman shows that she loves her married life and wants to make her husband happy in every way, but she needs to apply makeup in an appropriate way. And her appearance is beautiful in the dream until the previous interpretation is fulfilled. When the dreamer sees in her dream a woman who did not know how to apply cosmetics to her face, the dreamer helped her and she applied makeup until she became beautiful and her appearance was accepted. This indicates the dreamer’s love for helping others, and he will help the woman he knows in reality. If the dreamer’s life was full of disputes and she saw in her dream that she was putting cosmetics on her face until she became beautiful, then this is a sign of renewed love with her husband, and if her life was turbulent, this dream confirms For her, the troubles will disappear soon. However, if she applied cosmetics in the wrong way in her dream and made her face look disheveled, this indicates many disagreements with the husband, and she may separate from him and suffer from many pains and problems as a result of the separation. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup for a married woman in Ibn Sirin Firstly, it is an important thing that must His explanation, which is that the makeup used today was not known in ancient times when the reliable interpretation books were written, developed by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, therefore this dream will be interpreted. According to what Ibn Sirin said about ancient cosmetics such as kohl and some simple powder that was used to change the color of the cheeks, eyebrows, and eyelashes. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is putting a lot of cosmetics on her face, this is a sign that she is a woman fascinated by the world and loves pleasures, and this is how the scene reveals About her extreme neglect in her attention. Her home, her husband, and raising her children. If a woman puts kohl in her eyes, this indicates two meanings. The first meaning: She has intuition and insight. The second meaning: Very soon she will become pregnant and give birth to a child, and this fact will make her happy in her life. But if the fortuneteller puts the kohl in a bad condition and her appearance is frightening She may go through bad events in her married life, and some jurists have said that her husband will die or go through a serious illness that will make her very sad for him. Interpretation of a dream about putting makeup on a pregnant woman: Putting makeup on a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the birth of a girl in reality, and the more beautiful the makeup looks and makes the dreamer attractive and happy with her appearance, the more the dream shows the beauty and greatness of her daughter. Happiness that she gave birth. And if she sees that she is buying a lot of expensive cosmetics, this indicates a lot of money and food that she will enjoy immediately after giving birth. Some jurists said that makeup in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person taking a ring from a living person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a dead person taking a ring from a living person in a dream. Some people want to know the dream interpretation of a dead person taking a ring from a living person in a dream. The holders of scholarly interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person taking a ring from a living person in a dream. In the event that one saw that the deceased was taking a ring from him, then he may This indicates the power that the dreamer exercises over those around him during this time. In the event that one sees that the deceased was taking a ring from him, this may indicate a material loss that the dreamer may suffer in his life during those days. In the event that one sees the dead taking a ring from him, this may indicate a material loss that the dreamer may suffer in his life during those days. From the living, this may indicate problems at work or crises that the dreamer may face in his life during this time. In the event that the deceased is seen taking a ring from the dreamer, this may indicate some stress and tension that the dreamer is experiencing in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking forgiveness from living people in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that the dead person asked him to forgive him, it is possible that he needed charity at that time, and God knows best. The living person asking the dead person to ask for forgiveness may indicate his need for supplication in those days. Everyone who Seeing in a dream that the deceased was asking the living to forgive him may indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life at that time, and he must ask for God’s help. Dreaming of the dead asking forgiveness from the living may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this time. Period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a deceased person buying new clothes for himself in a dream. Seeing a deceased person buying new clothes in a dream may indicate the cover that the dreamer gains during this period, thanks to God. A dream of a deceased person presenting the dreamer with new clothes may indicate the abundance of money that he obtains. The dreamer is at that time, thanks to God. If the deceased saw that the deceased was buying new clothes, this may indicate the blessings that he enjoyed, and God knows best. To see yourself buying new clothes in a dream may indicate good things to come and happiness that will come to the dreamer during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burying the dead inside the house in a dream: In the event that a person sees the deceased buried inside the house, this could indicate that the dreamer is traveling or working far away from his family. A dream about burying the dead inside the house in a dream may indicate a wedding or joy date. Coming to the people of the house thanks to God. If you see in a dream the deceased being buried inside the house and the people of the house are crying, this may indicate changes that are occurring in the lives of the people of the house at that time and they must seek God’s help. . If a person sees burying the dead inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the problems that the people of the house faced at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the deceased sad and crying in a dream. It is possible that seeing the deceased is sad and crying may indicate worries and problems that the dreamer faces. In his life during this period. The crying and sadness of the deceased in a dream may indicate financial hardship or financial crises.
